He admitted that it was a mistake on his part, but didn’t help do anything about it. I don’t mean to bash on the company, but I find it odd that they can’t help solve a problem that they caused.

Dash clock doesn't work after this stereo is installed in a honda accord due to the clock not being connected to the stereo or anything im guessing. Was working fine before. Just looks like it glitches (clock). Also I wired everything how it was suppose to and my to front speakers and door speakers don't work.

I’ve been ordering from Crutchfield for more than 20yrs, and this is the first time I had a negative experience. I ordered a car stereo from the “scratch and dent” store, and it was a straight up USED stereo. The volume buttons had very visible wear on them, not scratched or dented, and there were grease marks and fingerprints all over the back of the unit. I wouldn’t have paid even the discounted price for a used stereo, I was expecting a new unit with cosmetic blemishes.

Review.Titre: I ordered several items after using the…
Review.Contenu: I ordered several items after using the car fitament application on your site. I order two sets of speakers along with the wiring harness to hook up my new head unit. You guys were even kind enough to give me the adapters to hook the new speakers right into my connection already in the car. Thank you. I received everything within literally 48 hours. I am very satisfied with the whole process from ordering to delivery. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Not my best speaker installation experience........
Review.Contenu: The Good:  Order arrived promptly, as promised. Speakers successfully installed and sound pretty good.The Not-So-Good:  Speaker mounting holes did not align well with mount surface holes inside panels (mounting screws had to be installed at an angle to secure the speakers.  Wiring harness supplied was for a Nissan, so connectors had to be modified (shaved with a razor knife) to fully engage.Although the effort ultimately succeeded, I expected better from Crutchfield, thus the 2 star rating.

Review.Titre: Cannot even install the car stereo (did…
Review.Contenu: Cannot even install the car stereo (did ship fast) because the mounting brackets are "out of stock". Meanwhile, they are in stock on Ebay. Should have just bought everything together on Ebay instead of waiting (still am and will be for a month) for the part to come in stock. By then the price of the stereo will probably drop and I would have been better off not buying it in the first place.

Panasonic 4k UHD BluRay DVD recorder arrived quickly. Unfortunatley it arrived without batteries for the remote (annoying) or an AC adapter (show-stopper). The AC adapter is non-standard -- two widely spaced prongs -- so I had no equivalent subtitute. Without the AC adapter I have yet to be able to turn the thing on to see how, or if, it works.

Really only good thing about this is that they have an option to include everything you want. But radio didn’t fit like it was advertised, wiring was HORRIBLE and came with essentially no instructions. The bracket to hold the radio didn’t fit, none of the holes lined up. Literally zero instructions. Should come with an option that is very specific to vehicle and that they make it plug and play. Took over 5 hours to finally just decide to hardwire everything, didn’t even use some of things included that I paid for.

Review.Titre: I paid for next day shipping and…
Review.Contenu: I paid for next day shipping and received my ordered product even later than the date given for free shipping. I contacted ups to get refunded and they said I had to speak to the company that I paid directly for the shipping, so I did. Instead of even getting back to me they sent an email as if I had requested a subscription to be mailed to me. I probably would’ve gotten better customer service from amazon.

Review.Titre: Other retailers have better price, return policy and pricematch policy
Review.Contenu: First time customer. Purchased a stereo from Crutchfield not knowing a local major retailer was also selling the same product at a lower price. Emailed Crutchfield right away to see if they can price match their competitor and they said no. With other retailers offering better return policy, price match policy and price, I would not be a returning customer.

So called "Mastersheet" was useless.  Did not explain how to unplug the speakers from the door.  I called them and talked to a Smith but was no help.  Sent an email and gave them my order # and never heard from them again.....even after three follow up emails with NO REPLIES.VERY disappointed in Crutchfield.  Will not recommend.  It seems that once they have your money they will ignore you.

I went to order a in expensive radio for my farm truck. After putting the year and make of my truck it came back with the recommended radio so i ordered it. Received the radio and was no way going to fit in truck. Called tech support and was told i have to purchace a dash plate and wire harness and splice the wires together. The return policy has a restocking fee that is half the price i paid for radio. Not happy with this company.

Prices were good - shipping was fast, critical DATA SHEET for my 21 Ram with the Alpine system is COMPLETELY WRONG. Every Metra quick connect and the Crutchfield instructions has the wiring out of phase (had to re pin the connectors). If replacing the speakers in these trucks with Active Noise Cancellation, if phase isn’t right you will get horrible noises while driving. Thankfully because of the 5Gen Rams forums, I had a copy of the Ram/Mopar wiring schematic for this system. C’mon Crutchfield- I expect better. A little more ‘research’ to save your customers A LOT of potential hassle.

Review.Titre: Temporary rating i hope, but maybe not
Review.Contenu: Temporary rating i hope. Placed an order, at a higher price than Amazon, because of the assumption I can easily get support for install.What I now know isbits conditional, you can call but can't chat or email. I wanted to get an email address for support to send a photo of my inherited car audio trunk wiring for a sub. Now I have to explain over the phone which will not be anything nearly complete compared to a photo.If a customer who had placed an order wants to send a photo, you should give them the choice otherwise I'm not a customer, I'm a subordinate.

Focal Integration ISS 165 6-3/4" component speaker system. Is sized 6 3/4" from Crutchfield and 6 1/2" from Focal. Yes it says it wont fit my vehicle but I have 6 1/2" kickers that i was replacing them with. Now i have to buy or make a speaker pod to use them in. A more descriptive overview or detail would have helped avoid this problem. Still keeping them because they are a good deal.

Review.Titre: Excellent service if the part comes from Crutchfield.  If not, be prepared to wait.
Review.Contenu: Ordered a car stereo and an additional accessory.  The accessory came from Crutchfield while the stereo was shipped from the manufacturer.   Accessory came within 2 days. Good communication. Still waiting in the stereo...or any communication.   I know this is coming from the manufacturer, but I bought it from Crutchfield.  It is their responsibility to keep me updated and make sure that I get my product in a timely manner.  I ordered 7 days ago.  Nothing.

I have a 2002 GMC Yukon XL. I used the “what fits my car” feature on the web site to replace the sub. The Crutchfield web site list speakers would fit without modification. When I took the old speaker out and tried to replace it with the new speaker, the new one was too tall and wouldn’t fit and to replace the box to fit the new speaker is $$$.

Customer support was excellent. However when I was installing the speakers I realized that I was never sent the bracket.  So there I sat, with tools every where, truck door panel laying on floor and screaming child.  Called Crutchfield support to confirm part was never automatically added to order.  Not happy to leave truck in this condition for 4 days until I get the bracket.  Hope the speakers sound good otherwise this was a disaster.

I purchased the M3-650X-S-Gw-i Marine Coaxial speakers with “BUILT “ in RGB LED.  They have great sound quality but I also wanted the LED which is advertised as “ built in “.   I purchased $260.00 speakers to find out I also need a $200.00 RGB lighting controller (sold separately).  Ya got me!

Review.Titre: Was disappointed in the performance of…
Review.Contenu: Was disappointed in the performance of the speakers recommended by the associate. I told the associate that I wanted something better than my stock 2014 Chevrolet Silverado standard speakers but didn’t want to break the bank either. The associate was very nice and helpful but I think we come up short. The standard equipment was just as impressive as the new speakers and a tad louder.  On top of that I was looking for strictly a plug and play purchase. 4 hours of install time wasnt what I was looking for.

I paid more through crutchfield because it came with connectors and adapters for the ring size. I had to repair one of the connectors because he crimp was broken and the ring adapters didn’t fit he front or rear speakers. I had to cut up my old factory speakers and use them to install the new speakers. It was a huge mess and waste of time. I could have saved a lot of money by just buying them from eBay or amazon. This will probably be my last crutchfield purchase.

In spite of identifying the year, make, and model of the vehicle these were going in neither the wiring harness nor the brackets fit the vehicle. The speakers themselves seem fine and were somewhat protected by a properly sized box (no packing peanuts or cushioning provided) and arrived undamaged but I no longer see the benefit to ordering from Crutchfield over other locations when the extras they offer are not uusable. Crutchfield's marketing is more effective than the implementation and leads to feeling let down with my purchase despite not receiving anything less than I would have from their competitors.

Ordered speakers for the truck, when received, an included wiring harness was not in box. Contacted Crutchfield and it was explained the wiring harness was on backorder. So now stuck with speakers that I cannot install. Just shaking my head. Will be returning item.

Review.Titre: Bought this unit as an open box/scratch…
Review.Contenu: Bought this unit as an open box/scratch and dent. Unit is functional but very beat up. Edges were damaged and touched up. Unit will not sit firm on my floor. Wobbles. Too much trouble to return because of the size. I will not make the same mistake twice.

I was disappointed in the entire experience. The  installation kit required notable modifications to get it to fit and all components required some alterations.  In the end I am not sure I could distinguish between the stock speakers and the replacements. Overall I would say the advice and the product was a bust.

Review.Titre: The car stereo that I purchased is…
Review.Contenu: The car stereo that I purchased is fantastic!  The shipping, however, is terrible.  Don't waste your money to expedite your order, I paid extra for 2 day shipping and got my product 5 days after I ordered it.  I think you should refund my 2 day shipping charge.

Crutchfield stated (Phone conversation), that this unit would be better than my OEM. Wrong! I would have been better buying OEM from the junk yard. I though a new unit would last longer and sound at least as good. I was wrong. Lighting can't be adjusted, have to switch from a day color to a night color just to drive, have to push a button to see what time it is. EQ is a joke. Why make this unit in the first place, better yet, why would Crutchfield promote garbage? Don't get the friction thing, just bad advise.

Disappointed that my speakers were damaged during shipment. Both binding posts of my left powered speaker were broken off. I was able to jury-rig a repair so that my speakers would work.My bamboo finished YU2s look great and now sound fine, so I did not return them.

Review.Titre: This customer purchased a Yamaha Sound…
Review.Contenu: This customer purchased a Yamaha Sound Bar, after receiving assurance that it would accept a Bose Wave RCA output.  After connecting the Sound Bar to the Bose, there was "no joy."  This customer again called Crutchfield and spoke with a technician, who reiterated that the Bose/Yamaha should work.  This technician advised me to call Bose about "the problem"  Of course Bose is closed, due to the pandemic.  This Yamaha Sound Bar still does not work, and UPS is also "shuttered." So I'm now stuck with a Sound Bar that does not work.

Review.Titre: Claimed they forgot to add my…
Review.Contenu: Claimed they forgot to add my instructions manual on installing my radio and my installation kit . But my invoice showed it was all added on there.  Cant install a radio without a kit . Package came in and looked like a baseball bat was used on it . I probably wont be buying from them again. Sad !

Won't be using Crutchfield again because of lack shipping options. A lot of package thieves in my area and the lack of requiring a signature option at delivery for a few extra dollars, packages are left on front door unattended by UPS. Delivery stated by end of Monday, came home after dark Saturday night and my $500.00 Blu-Ray player was sitting out there on the front porch for god knows how long. I am very lucky nobody stolen the package off my porch and not going to buy from a company that puts my purchase in peril.

The item was shipped on time but the seller refused to accommodate my request to have it delivered to s UPS access point near home. This way I could sign for it and pick it up after work.Cruthfield just did not care, therefore, I had to cancel the order.

Review.Titre: I haven't used crutchfield in years and…
Review.Contenu: I haven't used crutchfield in years and always loved the experience. They are still the same. great to see an old experience still exists! Very pleased with the whole process!

This saddens me. We have always had an excellent experience with Crutchfied. But this time around, not so much. We received the stereo we ordered as well as the kit to adapt the steering wheel controls that you prescribed. However, after two attempts at installation and several calls to Crutchfield, only to learn the steering wheel controls we order are suddenly discontinued, the advisor we spoke to recommended that we cut the wires coming from our truck, which we dare not do, as it seemed like a permanent action at this point. I hope Crutchfield wants to rectify this.

Review.Titre: Disappointing experience. Will go elsewhere next time
Review.Contenu: I tried to purchase a nice Pioneer stereo with Bluetooth for my daughter's car with Indiana now mandating Bluetooth phone use only in your car. Bought the stereo at the same price I could get it at multiple other sites and also purchased all the necessary wiring harnesses to put it in. Got most of the stuff but was missing a major component which now seems to be on continuous backorder until the foreseeable future and still waiting to install the system. I Cancelled the order and will go elsewhere. Wanted to get the car stereo installed in a timely manner I will go elsewhere next time. Woman that I spoke to at Crutchfield seemed very nice

Review.Titre: Crutfield is good for research, buy elsewhere
Review.Contenu: Crutfield is good to talk to to service and product experts to get ideas and information. They Are very valuable. However The reason I give a poor rating is that their return/exchange policy is terrible. If for whatever reason you want to return a product, they deduct value for 'restocking fee', okay so then you reason you will just exchange it for a different product that they sell. Guess what, you have to cop out for the return shipping, so the total cost of returning is now more than what you initially paid. One of the reasons why I would buy from Crookfield is the total cost of product , but knowing that I need to pay to exchange is not acceptable. It may be for some.

Review.Titre: JL Audio C1-690 package for 2021 Subaru…
Review.Contenu: JL Audio C1-690 package for 2021 Subaru Crosstrek -the installation guide is missing how to unplug the wiring harnesses that let you take off the door panel and how to use the speaker adapters. The adapters are not very good. You need to cut a 45 mm hole in the tweeter adapter (not easy without the right drill) to flush mount the tweeter - I'm not sure it that was necessary to clear the grill. The woofer holes don't align well with the adapter holes, requires  some filing, and I still don't know what the intent was on screwing the speaker to the adapter - I found a secure solution, but it was not easy. Installing 2x woofer and tweeter to took about twice the time that it should have.

Review.Titre: I bought a Netgear Power Line 1200
Review.Contenu: I bought a Netgear Power Line 1200, instead of maintaining the level of Service I have 250 mbps, I can never get more than 45 mbps. As I have also called Netgear, and they told me other people had this issue, that they cannot exceed 45 mbps with 1200.  Their next Model up is the Power Line 2000. After this I called Crutchfield , and asked if the Power Line 2000 is available. I was told that is not an item they have in Stock at this time, but they may be able to special order it. I have not heard anything back. I am going to call Kay back to see what my options are, as I am not satisfied with the Power Line 1200 level of Performance.

Review.Titre: Radio order was shipped on time
Review.Contenu: Radio order was shipped on time, installation was hindered by lack of any wiring schematic and once completed, the connector had a faulty connector for the power feed. I used the connector from the old radio to make the new radio work.

Review.Titre: Bad ready harness and horrible customer service with my order.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a unit with the ready harness. It arrived and had horrible static sounds that occurred when moving the harness to install the unit in the dashboard. Or when I hit a bump in the road. I was promised a replacement that didn't show on the day promised. I called the next day and was told "it's on the way". A literal quote. Called again the day after that only to be told a replacement had never been ordered! Finally it was worked out and I got a harness that works. But now I have to go return the entire new unit shipped to me. Inconvenient and also seems like poor practice to do all of the extra shipping and bad for the environment. No wonder the equipment they sell is so expensive!!

I bought an adapter for the wiring harness, and a kit to fill in on the sides of my new head unit.The harness adapter worked just fine, but the face kit was worthless, I will have to find something else to fill the gaps.

Review.Titre: I rarely leave negative reviews of…
Review.Contenu: I rarely leave negative reviews of anything but I must be honest here. I used and ordered off this website, as it had come recommended by a friend. Also, I would be able to select the make/model of my vehicle and get the correct stereo system. This however did not work out correctly. The wrong harness was sent so I had to at the final hour go and buy a new one from a local store. then upon trying to get the unit to fit, it did not. Luckily the guy putting it in modified my car as well as the purchased stereo unit to make it work. The device itself it alright, functions without problem but I could have paid less elsewhere and saved myself a bit.

Review.Titre: Product does not work properly and…
Review.Contenu: Product does not work properly and instructions are of no help.  No audio out of right channel and no instructions on how to Balance the output between left and right channels.

Review.Titre: I went through the trouble of using …
Review.Contenu: I went through the trouble of using this site to get a proper install of my new radio, and everything was wrong. I had to completely undo the harness that I paid an additional $30 for, because there was specifications for what radio was stock, but not for if that radio was still present for a new one.  On top of that, all the items I got beyond that were not even for my car, and there were parts I paid for that were missing in the box I received.The only reason I'm not putting a 1-star is because the radio itself worked fine, but now I'm buying a proper brace to hold the radio and the cubby from somewhere else, and will unlikely ever use this site or it's services again.

Review.Titre: I spent nearly $3K on a new Samsung TV…
Review.Contenu: I spent nearly $3K on a new Samsung TV from Crutchfield, and 2.5 months into its life the TV developed a functional problem.  Turns out it has a defective part and needs repair.  All of my interactions with Crutchfield have been excellent, except for this issue -- I called and was told that because of the time that had passed (60 days) I would need to deal with Samsung directly.  That was mid December, and here it is Feb 1 and my TV still has not been fixed.  As much as I like Crutchfield, I don't like this hands off approach and the next time I buy a large, expensive item, I'm probably going to going to a local retailer who will work with me to fix the problem.  I spent too much $$ to spend the holidays and winter break with no TV.  Disappointed.

Review.Titre: The speakers were fine and price was…
Review.Contenu: The speakers were fine and price was good, but the whole reason for going with one online company over another was the other part - the information.  If you say a speaker fits my car it should be something I can easily do, or it should fit without any vehicular rework.  And all the info you sent just said "take out the old ones and pop in the new ones" - ??  Then why did one set come with adapters (which were useless) and why did you send extra wires and clips with no instructions as to why I needed them?  I figured it all out, but I shouldn't have had to.  And then i sent you a comment and you said "thanks  for shopping Crutchfields, if you have any needs in the future let us know" - ?
My order showed up a day late with no explanation.The pricing was decent and so far I am happy with the product so hopefully will not have to find out about return policies and further delays.
Haven’t installed this expensive car stereo as of yet. However, although there was no damage apparent, the packaging for the shipment was less than adequate. If this review let me, I’d post photos.

Review.Titre: Head unit KD-R690S did not come with Remote
Review.Contenu: Head unit KD-R690S did not come with remote control that website product description and product box and manual state is included - RM-RK52
You delivered the wrong color I’m not returning as I don’t want to deal with the return hassle I ordered black and you sent me cherry You should credit me some $ towards my purchase

Review.Titre: Add in my mind was deceiving,i wanted…
Review.Contenu: Add in my mind was deceiving,i wanted the mats with the water tray all the way around.  not these mats you can buy at a parts store for half that price.  NOT HAPPY
I ordered my speakers on February 9, 2021 and as of February 16, 2021 I still don’t have them. They were shipped the next day on February 10, 2021. I have no idea where they are.

Review.Titre: The Bose speaker system produced hum…
Review.Contenu: The Bose speaker system produced hum with the Scosche interface at all volume levels so I did not use it. As the speakers were quiet with the original radio, I suspected the Scosche interface.

Review.Titre: I ordered a radio and the website said…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a radio and the website said it would fit my car……, it did not. I ordered the SWC and it said it was for my car …… it didn’t work. What else can I say

Review.Titre: The wiring harness that I ordered is…
Review.Contenu: The wiring harness that I ordered is the wrong one. My 2004 dodge ram, has infinity sound system,  but does not have hands free option on the mirror.  Your harness connector was the wrong size.

Review.Titre: Bought stereo and speakers for my…
Review.Contenu: Bought stereo and speakers for my Harley..speakers came with no grills for saddle bags? Called back and was going to purchase them..I was told they did not have grills to fit?
Website provides excellent information. However this order is taking too long comparing to other companies. I am disappointed with my first order with Crutchfield

Review.Titre: It's taken us 6 weeks in total after…
Review.Contenu: It's taken us 6 weeks in total after our first 4 weeks I out it to the side then I decided to give crutchfeild another chance after all it would be the 11th stereo I've gotten with them but normally our audio dealer took care of them but after watching them installed my last stereo I seen how simple this process was. Our contact with this unit was Taylor from the beginning I should of found someone else he just seemed like I was bothering him or just not worth his time, maybe because I was only spending about $900. His emails was always (I forgot) or some reason he just didn't have the correct information on me or my needs I have all 25 emails linked so I could go back and double check our Convo. Well I guess we'll just have to buy on Amazon which I found everything on there for $175.79 lower than crutchfeild. So sad to see such great service fail so bad. The chance of the times I guess.

Typically me experience is pretty good, instructions were terrible this time. Crutchfield provided me a set, they didn’t seem to add up to what I had going on, looked up the instructions for my vehicle and the maestro RR and they were different from what crutchfield gave me, also wrong. After looking up the vehicle specific harness instructions that was also different from the other two I was able to figure everything out among the three different set of instructions. Also ordered an XM kit, was suppose to have a rebate for it and 3 months free of XM, after reviewing the offer for the free months it’s out of fate by a year, and no information on the rebate. Usually pretty good service but definitely not the best this time around. Plus, even though it stated I would retain certain features i in fact did lose some. Overall everything does work and it’s a much needed upgrade.
Crutchfield rocks..great selection of gear, knowledgeable sales team and tech support too.  Highly recommend using crutchfield for all your home/car audio/video needs!
My mounting kit came with a piece broken and the kit didn’t fit my car like the website said. I had to file some things down and remove the pocket for the single din.

Review.Titre: Radio does not come with any…
Review.Contenu: Radio does not come with any instructions how to use it,socks for older people

Tracking shows my purchase as being scheduled for delivery on 27-Nov (crutchfield website says 2 day shipping). I called crutchfield on 29-Nov and they called the delivery service to schedule delivery around noon on 30-Nov. Its past noon and I’m still waiting. Overall this hasn’t been a great experience and I would expect crutchfield to be handling the shipping better (without my intervention), especially since they claim 2 day delivery.

The product is great. It does the job. For my vehicle to get full functionality there are other cables that are needed however. That would have been great to know beforehand. My suggestion would be to have a checklist of all the features of your vehicle and whether you want them on your new stereo. Assuming the goal is to empower people who aren’t experts to be able to DIY.

The shipping was extremely fast!!! The manual was too generic and didn’t really help me install the speakers. Youtube offers way better assistance. Prices are not the best. I thought the new speakers were factory match but it wasn’t the case. I feel lied.

The ordering experience is good, but the execution was very bad. FedEx is not delivering the items in the time period that they put on their website and that causes the experience to leave me somewhat unhappy. They then cover their blunder by changing the delivery date as if they never made a mistake and let the order sit for a day without forwarding it for delivery.

Review.Titre: Far from plug and play as advertised
Review.Contenu: The speaker adapter rings I was supplied came with screws that weren’t large enough to bite into the plastic and hold the speaker in place. The screws supplied with the speakers were also too small. The holes for the speakers also did not line up with any of the speaker ring’s pre-drilled holes  This was sorted out by me having to drill new holes in the speaker adapters and use my own larger thread screws.

Review.Titre: LOST NAD C399 … The Crutchfield support…
Review.Contenu: LOST NAD C399 … The Crutchfield support people have been polite and helpful. But the issue is still to be resolved and I have not yet received a refund. I’m tod that the UPS investigation will “ require” 10 days & that I would hear from UPS. This supposed delivery occurred on Jan. 3. And I am awaiting contact from UPS. So, so far I am just out of a large amount of time and money.

So the radio I bought is awesome! Sony never fails. The Crutchfield instructions were pretty straight forward, but weren't the best. A lot of the steps either didn't apply and I had to butcher my trim piece to fit the new radio, but the steps I needed were very detailed. I was also recommended to buy several parts I did not need or didn't fit (even though it was "for my vehicle.") Overall it's a great product with decent instructions, but you need to know what you're doing so you don't buy something you don't need.

The placing order experience was top notch, easy and efficient.  The shipping function was not as good as it should have been.  Shipping from Charlottesville, leaving on a Monday, I was given tracking information on Monday that indicated a Thursday delivery. Then on Tuesday, the tracking information indicated a Wednesday delivery.  Late on Wednesday, the shipping company called an said delivery would be between 10-12 Thursday.  This confusion made my planning difficult.

The selection and ordering experience was great.  The box containing all the expensive gear was falling apart.  When they carrier opened their van to get my box, pieces of my order was spread across the floor of the van.  I could see damage to the boxes inside the shipping box.  He quickly taped it up and I recently accepted the package.Now I feel extremely rushed to try and get everything installed to see if it all works.Crutchfield really needs to explore using only reputable carriers.

Review.Titre: Crutchfield is great this is my 3rd…
Review.Contenu: Crutchfield is great this is my 3rd purchase. The kenwood speakers I just bought not so much, the mounting tabs are plastic so when installing I broke one of the tabs. I can’t return because it was my fault but these are cheaply made.

Crutchfield did a great job getting the order out same day, December 14th on 2 day delivery.  UPS dropped the ball as it is now the 20th and I still don't have the product.   It was tracked to to my local distribution center at 5:00 AM on the 16th but hasn't left there.

I was working on an 2002 escalade. I take no issue with the core products but the additional recommended installation products were mostly useless. The adapters for my speakers were useless. I didn't need them, and had I used them I would have ended up with a worse install vs a bit of dremeling and drilling. The installation instructions for the included backup camera were not clear. I wish they had included wiring pinouts for my amplifier. I ended up paying AC Delco for this information. If I was looking for a piecemeal solution, I would have gone with a cheaper vendor.

Review.Titre: Shipped wrong parts for my model year
Review.Contenu: Everything arrived on time however, I ordered 4 speakers. 2 came with the right mounts for a 2016 Kia but the other 2 mounts were for a 2020 Kia. I ended up modifying them to make them work, however it was frustrating and made the job take much longer.

Its not crutchfield. I thought the speakers where going to sound better than my stock speakers not much better at all.  I ordered jbl two ways  and installed them that was replacing my stock  sony speakers.

The item was delivered promptly, but your shipping method was substandard at best.  The box you shipped the item in was way bigger than necessary and the extra space was taken up by a boat load of packing peanuts.  Next time ship in a smaller box and used crumpled paper to fill the extra space.  The earth will thank you.

To much duffilcut connection problem ( thousand small cable ) , the some models dont have car play , if you do something fit to car just check dimension and make correctly fit and connection. Cable , on table inside when have lots space  connection is nice but show on your movie instruction how you connection inside car !!!
I was told that my order would arrive on a certiam day and it did not get here. Very disappointed after all the years that I have beeen making purchases.

3 stars in my system is a product and service that is as expected.  Crutchfield had always been a 5 star experience in the past this experience was not as great.Pros: product seems good quality         Technical support was easy to access and very helpful.           Everything was included that was neededCons: Crutchfields detailed instructions were missing as a result I just went with prior experience.          One face plate did not seem to fit as it would not go between receiver and double din conversion.  This may be because if lack of instruction so radio was improperly mounted.In the past it seemed like whoever wrote the instructions had actually mounted the unit in a vehicle similar to mine and all possible problems were addressedProblems I encountered because of no detailed instructions:  it seemed the unit was not going in so I cut out more than was necessary because the mounting had to be mounted on an angle to be flush with dash. I connected wires color to matching color but thanks to tech support when unit didn't work I needed to match blue/white with blue.  Final trim would not fit so has to remove mounting tabs and enlarge radio size to be flush.  It took me over 8 hours to complete the mount where before with detailed directions I usually did it in a couple of enjoyable hours instead of trying to get things to work.Would I use Crutchfield again?  Definitely but before starting would contact tech support and get detailed instructions.

Review.Titre: I have always appreciated Crutchfield - But...
Review.Contenu: I have always appreciated Crutchfield as a top of the line stereo supplier, but this time did not go so well.The Boss stereo, well was a little hard to get installed in the factory bezel, it took a few hours to figure out how to make it work and not, either crack the factory bezel, or not have a huge gap in the fit and finish, this on a 99 Nissan Maxima. The usually straight forward install guide was lacking in some areas, and seemed to focus on a single DIN not a double DIN. It would be a good idea to go back and add some material or links on this, especially the back up camera section, which the Boss overview was absolutely useless. I did find a Crutchfield youtube video on wiring and it helped a lot, explaining the Convenience wire and reverse feed, a blurb in your install instructions would have been appreciated. So all is installed, but I will be cautious on the next order, as I have been a customer for a long time and multiple cars over the years, but my daughter is happy and the stereo works and she has Apple Car Play, so all in all, a long install, but a win.

I had bought a expensive audio video reciever several years ago. And Crutchfields states life time support for products they sell. Video stopped working on reciever, I called and was told the product was out of warranty, which I knew it was. Told to send to factory authorized repair shop that was out of state. Found out shipping and inspection of unit would be over $300.00 with an additional cost for any repairs.  Was talking to a friend and he suggested to check and see if any hdmi cable was turned off, he was surprised that I wasn't told to check it. I did and that was the problem, just a tap of a button fixed the problem. It seems the life time support only last as long as the warranty. I was about to spend $2500.00 on another reciever. I had bought from Cruthfields before, thinking I would get a bit more support and paid full manufacturer suggested price, but that's not what will happen. I'm lucky I have a friend that knows stereo equipment.

Review.Titre: Toyota Mini Van Speakers and wire harness
Review.Contenu: I really liked that the Tech seem to know the details.  What I did not like is when I rec. it the wire harness would not work and we had to splice it to make it work.   So the Details and specs are not really correct.
Crutchfield has always been great... but the Metra kit that came with this purchase is garbage.  The install is second rate at best.

Dislike=why does Crutchfield make you wait to use your rewards points? I would love to add a front camera to my new installation but now I'm left with the decision, do I not finish until I can use my points to purchase the camera? do I go without the camera and finish the install? or do I buy the camera, (maybe on eBay), and leave the points unused? Maybe finish this install and take the radio out later to add the camera? I don't see any good options and Crutchfield put this situation on me and it sucks. Like=website is fantastic.

Glad I got what I ordered but when I received the packages the boxes it came in were open and half of the box was split down the side so it was flapping open and the items inside the packaging was tore open and the other boxes were all trashed and busted open so I would say that's my only gripe was just poor packaging from the items to the boxes they came.

Review.Titre: Crutchfield needs to have a list of nationwide installers to recommend
Review.Contenu: I emailed and asked if they had any recommended installation shops but got no response. I wish crutchfield would partner with auto installers in and around larger cities throughout America to recommend places for customers to have their car stereos installed. I also think they're kind of slow to ship.

No problems, this is my Fifth order from Crutchfield. Currently waiting on an Optical cable to run the TV through my new Yamaha Amp. I want to stream music. The DAC is built into the amp for an analog sound, correct? That’s what I’m looking for. Thanks
Speakers didn’t fit. I need to Exchange with speakers that fit

No issues with Crutchfield. The kit we ordered had limited instructions and didn’t really accomplish what was stated. The vehicle required EXTENSIVE modifications that we were unaware of until it was taken apart for install. The kit should have had the warning and instructions in the description.
I didn't like the fact, that I had to splice in the speakers, prior purchases, you could get the factory connectors for this

Review.Titre: The JVC stereo I selected can't be secured in dash
Review.Contenu: The JVC stereo I selected can't be mounted in my car with the "sleeve" it comes with. Bending the tabs to secure the unit won't work because there is nothing to secure them to but the 1 1/2 inch support bar the old radio and cd utilized. If you are going to market this receiver for this car you should provide a kit to install it.

I wanted a little more sound quality in my 2020 GMC Sierra, my purchases provided some but I probably should have stayed with Polk Audio like all my previous vehicles.  Shipping was quick and packed nicely with almost all needed supplies, I had to purchased some bolts with nuts to make the front speakers installation possible because the provided speakers screws won’t work without the speaker grills.  I was able to make the back speakers work with a fatter screw.

Very happy with the product. The delivery was very very bad. Live in apartment building product was left by the mailbox in the building not delivered to my door. UPS is the worst delivery company, could care less weather customers receive their purchase.

Not overly impressed with the directions and the install kit looks cheap. Not sure why I thought quality only comes at a higher price. I recently bought a cheap version for my other car and it has more features and the installation was painless. Sorry won't make this mistake again.

Review.Titre: Ordered two sets of car speakers
Review.Contenu: Ordered two sets of car speakers.  Kept one pair but returned the other pair because they were too small.  Speakers I kept work great so no issues with the speakers.  Higher price than Amazon but that was OK this time.Had to pay $12 for return shipping label which I felt was way too high.  Amazon and other places let you return for free for any viable reason.  Yes it was my error but $12!!!  I have bought from Crutchfield many times in the past but this has left a very sour memory.

I've used Crutchfield since the '80's and they've always been quite good.  I bought a Sony 50" tv for my son and ordered it to coincide with his moving across state.  It showed up the day before the move as planned but the box is a mess.  Is it open box or did it get tossed around by UPS?  Do I take a chance and set it up or just send it back? Either way it's a major hassle for both me and my son and I find myself wishing I'd gone to a big box store. To be continued...

Review.Titre: I know my car is a 2008 but…..
Review.Contenu: I know my car is a 2008 but I had higher expectations. The head unit did not fit but on a side note it gave me a good excuse to buy that dremel I was putting off. The in dash adapter kit for the head unit is In place with duck tape because the plastic was warped to the points the clips for the cubby would not stay in place.  It was like this right out of the bag.  It was easier to use self tapping sheet metal screws in stead of the speed clips when mounting the door speakers.  If I ever meet the engineer that designed the rear deck speaks I’m gona kick him in the privates. Removing the rear deck cover and working around it to replace the speakers was horrible. Either way I got through it with a little ingenuity, duck tape, and a dremel. These three things can fix the world.

Awesome customer service.  I received a damaged battery, shipped me a replacement same day!!!However, you supposedly have 60 days to return items, when I started this return, next day after receiving, was told they had to get the exchange in 14 days or I would be charged.  Just thought everyone should know that. I know the damaged item was not my fault, just think they should at least give you 30 days, or tell you otherwise.

Review.Titre: Ordered a duo android auto stereo for…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a duo android auto stereo for my 13 tundra and paid extra for the deluxe install kit to find out it wasn't plug and play as I was. Led to believe .

Review.Titre: The spare earphones look OK but I have a different older charger that won't work with them
Review.Contenu: The earphones are OK but I bought them for a replacement for an earlier version set that has a different charger (my mistake).   I noticed that the appropriate charger is no longer available from Cructchfield so I have ordered the whole system from Amazon and will keep your earphones as a spare.   I should've been more careful in checking charger comaptibility.

Review.Titre: I've rated my experience as 3 stars…
Review.Contenu: I've rated my experience as 3 stars because I haven't received my order yet. The customer service I received from Ray was phenomenal. He answered all my questions, never made me feel rushed and spent time researching to make me comfortable I was purchasing exactly what I wanted and needed. Just awaiting my order to see if this warrants more stars.
Lack of flexibility regarding shipping date was inconvenient.

Speakers are good. The kit I ordered to install the front speakers did not come with hook-ups for the tweeters. It just had a wire for the other front speaker. The front speakers came with a base speaker, tweeters, and crossovers.

Fine so far, but where are the details about the installment plan? Nothing in email, pdf attachment anywhere. I have no idea when my next payment is due. Is this misleading?Edit: Just checked the email again. The pdf does not contain any such information, just the initial purchase.

Review.Titre: I have always had a good experience…
Review.Contenu: I have always had a good experience shopping with Crutchfield but during my last order they weren´t able to process it because I was using an international credit card.  This is the same credit card I have used with multiple e-commerce companies.  At the end, I had to use Paypal but the overall experience wasn´t nice

05 Tucson GL, got boss elite 550B stereo, DIN install kit with lower pocket, metra wiring harness & pack of posiloc wiring nut things.-Stereo is awesome! Sounds great for system without amp. Alot of power and clear sound.- DIN install kit snug fit, secures nicely.-Metra wire harness didnt match up, someone had installed santafe 24 pin monsoon stereo & chopped away old harness.-Posiloc wire nut are garbage! Sold in pack of 16 & 2 broken inside before even beginning. (they supposed to be better, reusable, watertight but i don't believe).So I gave 3 because 60-70 % of order ok.Also had to remove stereo trim ring and replace with kit trim ring which keeps popping off...

Review.Titre: The particular speakers I order for my…
Review.Contenu: The particular speakers I order for my 2014 Ford Fusion needed speaker extensions to mount them properly. The instructions said nothing about how to get the speaker wires under or through the extensions (no port or opening was provided) so they could be plugged in so I had to modify them so they would work. Other than that, the installation went well and the speakers were top notch.

Review.Titre: Fast shipping...but NOT EASY to install
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping and materials were packed well, but the install WAS NOT easy. Damage to car door occurred and directions proved ambiguous. Speakers did not slide into nor fit the adaptors that came with them. I had to drill holes and cut out pegs for that to happen. Will hire a pro next time. Was not easy at all. Directions need to be more thorough. Phone calls didn’t help.

Review.Titre: Was told the stereo that I was ordering…
Review.Contenu: Was told the stereo that I was ordering would fit my specific vehicle, it did not. I modified my vehicle permanently in order to get a radio that was sold under the guise of fitting perfectly. Please be more careful in future regarding what is sold for which vehicle.

Bought the " ready Harness" option, which by and large worked well and made overall install pretty easy. However a LOT of time was wasted trying to figure out why the reverse camera trigger wasn't working. Eventually found one of the wires in the harness was open circuit! The lesson probably is to do a continuity check on the harness before installation, to prevent later confusion!

Review.Titre: My friend ordered his SVS PB16 from…
Review.Contenu: My friend ordered his SVS PB16 from Amazon the exact same day as I ordered my SVS 3000 from Crutchfield . His was delivered  Tuesday.I  am still waiting on mine. Be aware Crutchfield is extremely  slow delivering  big items although they are geographically in my back yard (Greensboro NC) Should of taken his advice and ordered from Amazon.

Review.Titre: I found the cerial to be good but not…
Review.Contenu: I found the cerial to be good but not exceptional like avertised the chocolat/coca was bland and lact much flavor the peanut butter was a little better the rest i havent tried yet i will in the future but i am not holding any expectation but it was worth the try the service was great the delivery was quick and the product arrived on time

Ordered an upgrade for a wireless charger. Part came in a decent amount of time with free shipping. Works great, and was a seamless transaction. Only unfortunate aspect of my purchase was that there was zero installation instructions with the part. Luckily it was a simple enough process that I could figure it out without too much thought.

Review.Titre: When I got the product in the mail I…
Review.Contenu: When I got the product in the mail I was super excited to put the new stereo in my truck. I was putting it in and following the directions and it didn’t even work. I called the tech support and the person on the phone didn’t even know what was going on either he told me to do somethings to troubleshoot but nothing worked. Just upset that I spent over $300 for something that didn’t work now waiting for the next one.

Ordered this television the weekend before Christmas, with the understanding it would be delivered by Christmas.  Did not happen!  It arrived in my town on December 23rd, and I received a call from the delivery company that same day, saying they were to busy to get to me until the week after Christmas.  Nothing I said to them would change their mind.  Extremely disappointed!  Crutchfield needs to partner with better delivery people.

When I called to be sure of what I needed for install my advisor was sincere and helped me pick what was needed. The only issue is that the adapter provided is connected and I no longer have rear speakers. You have to fabricate something to retain rear speakers which is fine for me but may not be for others. Please ensure you educate your customers and help choose the right harness.

Review.Titre: Good support, but lousy written instructions
Review.Contenu: Installation required several customer support calls and modifying the components sent. For example, the screws included with the speakers were too long, a problem the technician I spoke with explained was well known, but was not disclosed in the included written instructions. I credit Crutchfield with providing the support needed to complete the project, but subtract points for inadequate written instructions and selling parts of questionable quality.

Review.Titre: Do not take shipping rebate for slower ground delivery!
Review.Contenu: I ordered a 5.1 Yamaha receiver and it was to be delivered almost a week ago -   Still no sign of my package.  Take my advice and do not opt for the shipping rebate for going with slower ground shipping!  Probably not Crutchfield’s fault, but I am still not happy about the delay!

Review.Titre: I have dealt with crutchfield for years…
Review.Contenu: I have dealt with crutchfield for years and for the most been very happy but this time I order a new system for my pickup and speakers which the speakers were fine but the stereo was not new it had been open the user manual was not for my stereo there seems to be functions that do not work or I need the original manual to proceed with whic I will download..Sorry for the poor rating but cust care was not used this time.

Headphones have a solid good contruction. When you use them wired they sound pretty good, but when you use the Bluetooth options they sound like kind of interference and sound is without details. Battery Life is very good. Google assistant and Alexa also are good features. But I didn't like the most important the sound quality.in bluethooh mode. Thanks to crutchfield excellent service.

Purchased inexpensive radio, and antenna adaptor, and wiring adaptor. I had to bypass the factory amplifier in order to have good sound quality, also had to find and install a noise filter on the battery power lead, as there was loud whining from the alternator.Didn't expect much, after install sounds good, but I wish the wiring kit had included a noise filter, as the radio was unuseable without it.

The "instructions" that Crutchfield provides don't cover anything but removing trim and the fact that they say ther are worth $10 is shameful when I can get that for free from the internet. I was expecting a detailed guide on installing the products I purchased including the wiring. Sadly none of that was covered and I had to Google quite a bit of information on the wiring harnesses.

Knocking it down one for them sending the wrong harness, which set me back about an hour. I had to use the old harness from the previous unit. I didn't notice it at the time, but there was a warning about a slight gap between the unit and the dash. Knocking it down one because no faceplate or cover solution is offered, just an acceptance of a gap.The head unit was great and does everything I want. The shipping was super quick. The instructions were helpful. The entire installation only took about 3 hours.

Great selection of top-notch products, trusted source for quality reviews, however, you'll never find a deal on prices, and I find there is not enough info about ALL of the products I need to install.  I always end up having to go and find cables, power cords, fuses, connectors, fit plates for the dash, etc. for the purchase after the fact.

So far shopping at Crutchfield has been similar to shopping at the local stores. Nothing spectacular yet, but I did just receive my new 4K player and have yet to do any hook up. I did contact them via chat session before the purchase and the person I talked with seemed helpful enough, even though it did seem they had about as much information as I did on the Panasonic 4K player.

The product (auto speakers) appear ok, but the instructions to install them were scandalously lacking, just plain erroneous! Screws sent to mount the units were too long, speaker mounting instructions woefully inadequate for a lay person, and several important steps were just left out. I hope to relay these comments to these folks, in the hope that others won't suffer through these instructions!

Review.Titre: Item shipped quickly and was as…
Review.Contenu: Item shipped quickly and was as expected. Thank you!  However, it was shipped in original packaging with celophane/clear wrapping so contents were identifiable.  Right before Christmas, I would have thought the packaging would be a bit more discreet.  My husband is furious that this gift will not be a surprise.

Speaker quality is pretty good from initial impressions, “master instructions” were sub par. They showed you how take apart you the door and remove the stock speaker but their installations instructions were “secure new speaker to adaptor harness” and that’s it the pictures included are only for the disassembly. Maybe I read them wrong or misunderstand the information but I ended up not using them because I felt like I got little information from it.

Review.Titre: At this moment I am a very happy customer. I spent several minutes with a technician named Chris who helped me get my unit working and answered all the questions I had. I
Review.Contenu: At this moment I am not a very happy customer. That may change when I contact the technical help department, however, at the moment I am not happy with my J B L wi fi speaker. It was a "scratch and Dent" purchase, that came out of the box speaking Spanish and with totally inadequate "quick start" suggestions. At the moment I am on the verge of returning this item but will give the tech guys a chance to help me get it working.To be Continued. Thanks, Leif Eriksson

The installation instructions that were sent were great.  My complaint is that I also bought a sub and amplifier.  There were no installation instructions for either.  The factory amplifier I discovered could have been removed when I had the dash apart for the speaker installation but I discovered that after I put everything back together.  I also thought it was odd that when I ordered the amplifier, it did not prompt me to buy the wiring kit for the amplifier installation.

I am not sure who is entirely at fault UPS or Crutchfield but my 2 day California shipping which they advertise on their website ended up taking 6 days. UPS claims they didn't receive the item to ship until 3 days after my order was placed but Crutchfield claims it shipped next day but at least my speakers finally arrived in excellent condition.

Not a bad radio. My problem was the wire harness that was sent was not correct. They plugged in fine but I did not have a constant power in the plug and the directions did not help or address this problem. Also there were no mounting brackets for the original spot. It is also a little bright during night time driving. Sound is good.

Review.Titre: I have been a Crutchfield customer for…
Review.Contenu: I have been a Crutchfield customer for several years; I’ve always been a huge fan of their outstanding customer service, and good product selection…Recently, however, they have made some changes to their technology platform and their web-based services, resulting in an inability to make purchases or get assistance. I cannot even log into the website without allowing them to track my every single movement.Sadly, this is the “new normal”, and people simply accept it.  I can’t.  Therefore, my only option is to cease being a customer of Crutchfield.No one has a right to track me in my purchases online for any reason. They do not need this information.

Shopping and shipping great, installation instructions specific to vehicle not good at all. They just instruct how to remove old speakers. Lineing up adapter to speaker to vehicle mounting holes a different story. No instructions on this. Took me over an hour of trial and error to figure it out. The website is very misleading and instructions offer little help.

The speaker brackets that were sent did not fit my vehicle at all. The extended tabs on the brackets were needed and didn't line up with the mounting holes on my 2014 JK. I had to cut apart the factory speakers to make my own mounting brackets. I like to have everything planned out and ready for any installations and this was a big pain. I installed speakers in the roll bar and the dash knee panel, adapter brackets didn't fit either locations.

Mark was awesome... as a frequent customer... I’m really disappointed in the delivery process ... web page has “ same day shipping in Virginia “ which did happen. But it took 7 days to get from Richmond to Culpeper va .... which is 1:20 mins away ... so it sat Somewhere for six days .

Ordering process and shipping were great. I’ve ordered from Crutchfield many times in the past and have never had a problem. Now to the item. The BTGM-33 installed into my 2007 Tahoe without any problems. The initial Bluetooth sync worked without issue. However, every time I get in my vehicle the Bluetooth will not connect. I have to turn the Bluetooth off and back on on my phone and wait several minutes before the Bluetooth syncs. Is quite frustrating waiting for the Bluetooth to connect. Not ask quick or as smooth as I thought it would be.

Review.Titre: They do not make photos available for…
Review.Contenu: They do not make photos available for the outlet merchandise, this info should be added to aid in the the decision to purchase scratch & dent or openbox merchandise. Was told by representative over phone , Taylor, that he couldn't tell me what issues maybe present regarding scratch&dent or open box.

Review.Titre: The parts that i ordered didn't match…
Review.Contenu: The parts that i ordered didn't match what i needed for my car. Good thing my husband is real crafty and made it work. But overall the speakers sounds great but the attachments to install the speakers it did not fit at all and the wires did not match to my car.

This does not fit into the slot where the factory stereo was after taking the plastic face off. It also came with a deep scratch on the screen. I have since returned this with no questions asked and a full refund. Stereo looks really nice and slick. Don't know how it works.

In my case, step by step instructions were not included for installation of front/rear speakers and as such it diminished the value of using such a great DIY firm. My car is not usual either, a 2015 Ford Mustang. Otherwise, great people and service; it would have equaled 5 stars. Thank you.

Shipping was fast, communication was good and my items arrived as described and packed well but the installation instructions, both as provided by Crutchfield and by Metra could be better.  The Crutchfield Master Sheet directions were fairly generic and not as specific as they should be (in my opinion) but the Metra installation directions were awful.  I emailed Crutchfield to tell them this, hopefully they'll go with a better supplier than Metra.

Review.Titre: Was happy with all the items I ordered but......
Review.Contenu: Was happy with all the items I ordered the prices were good but the option to have the head unit pre-wired for convenience and quick easy installation was a waste of money, ended up pulling the unit back out of my truck just to find wires that were cut in the crimped contours and some that pulled right out.

Product was nice.   The only reason this was a 3 because the size recommended by Crutchfield was the wrong size in the car once I went to install.  Crutchfield indicated that the door speaker size was a 6 1/2 and there was actually a 6x9 when I pull the door cover off.  They included a "kit" to install the speakers but if they included the kit, why didn't they recommend the 6x9 in the first place.   No big deal, I installed the speakers I purchased and it still sound great.

Your two day shipping offer was deceptive.  I placed my order on Thursday, Dec. 26th.  You didn't ship the order until Monday, Dec. 30th.  I didn't receive it until Thursday, Jan. 2nd. If your holiday season was going to get in the way, you you should have told me before I placed the order.

Review.Titre: Good website info but they sell you things you don’t need
Review.Contenu: They have a lot of information on the website regarding stereo specifications and compatbility, etc. And they have such a great selection. I really liked that I knew exactly what I was getting and the capabilities. Unfortunately they told me I needed certain accessories which apparently I didn’t need. Also, the instructions were not spot on and there was no instructions on the wiring connections; not even in the equipment instructions. Fortunately I figured it out and all works fine.

Review.Titre: Great pre-sales service but when things…
Review.Contenu: Great pre-sales service but when things go wrong Antonio in tech support was useless. I even think he didn't tell the truth, which was really off putting. Any how one quick call to the manufacturer revealed the problem. Where is Bill's email address when you need it!

Emailed wrong instructions ahead of delivery. They advised they dont have correct instructions for my F150. Caused extra work that was not required.When unit arrived it had correct instructions with it!  So much for the early start. Like the unit and this is first time crutchfield let me down.

Review.Titre: Ordering process was easy but tv…
Review.Contenu: Ordering process was easy but tv arrived unusable looks like the screen was broken, don’t know if was already damaged or damaged in transit. Let’s see if Crutchfield can get a replacement by Christmas, kind of doubt it.

Review.Titre: First let me say these guys are great…
Review.Contenu: First let me say these guys are great to work with, very patient and helpful and responsive. The first jvc head unit turned out to be defective, no sound. Couldn’t order a replacement because it was out of stock with no eta for shipment. Paid to upgrade to a more expensive Boss unit but the thing didn’t fit my truck even tho it was advertised to be a fit for it. Sent everything back, ordered the jvc unit from Amazon (plenty in stock) and used the crux module and instructions from Crutchfield and it all works now. Their instructions are great and the crux module interface is definitely the way to go, no cutting or changes to factory wiring.

On the whole, this was a great experience. Crutchfield made getting the right installation gear very straightforward. However, they did not include the option to get an adapter allowing usage of the OEM USB port. While they carried the part I needed, they did not suggest it at any point during the purchase process and I needed to buy it locally.Additionally, the master sheet had zero instructions for wiring. This ended up feeling like a ploy to get me to let the assemble the wiring harness next time. Still the best way to get what you need to setup a new car stereo, but their info is less complete than they present it.

Review.Titre: very helpful in trying to help me…
Review.Contenu: very helpful in trying to help me select a replacement radio for my 2012 Ram..only problem is when I received it, it had no CD player..Our conversation ended in summarizing I would only be giving up the Sirius, which I didn't care...Not sure what happened..

No muss no fuss. Product ordered is what I got. I was a bit disappointed with UPS Freight, so maybe look into other shipping options next time, or clearly state that the shipper won’t deliver to your house, just to the driveway (my driveway is 3/4 of a mile long, so this really does matter).

Installation instructions that are included with order had incorrect wiring colors listed for front dash speakers.  I call tech service and hopefully they gave me the correct positive and negative wiring as they didn't seem too sure of what they gave me over the phone.  They also said I would be able to tell clearly if the positive and negative wires were reversed polarity by listening to the sound but when I tried this it sounded the same to me.  Wish there was a premade harness for my vehicle but no such luck.Speakers (JBL Club 322F) arrived in a reasonable time, packed nicely so no damage and shipping was free.

The 1990 imported right hand drive Japanese truck wasn't set up for today's slide-in frame and trim ring but the face of the radio itself fit into the dashboard opening perfectly. We had to McGyver it a bit but it looks like a factory installation! Although the website led me to believe that by selecting the make and model of the car it would be an easy installation I really didn't expect it to pop in seamlessly. There might have been a disclaimer for someone with more expectations that I had, thus the mediocre review. I like the unit very much though!

Review.Titre: Plug and play adapters fit loose on…
Review.Contenu: Plug and play adapters fit loose on truck side and wires didn’t connect to speakers had to put different ends on to connect. Brackets hardly fit. Screws didn’t fit. Shipping was fast as promised.

Review.Titre: Everything went great until Crutchfield security got involved, then it was a nightmare.
Review.Contenu: Everything went great, until Stone sent the order to billing. While American Express approved the charge immediately, Crutchfield security decided that the name on my credit card did not exactly match my full name that they found online somewhere. They never bothered to tell me. Two weeks later, we struggled all one day with many phone calls to get a replacement order through and get it delivered before my son sent his car to the shop before going in for surgery the next day. We got it delivered with only a few hours to spare. Except for Stone's part, this was not a pleasant experience.

Review.Titre: One of the oldest mail order companies…
Review.Contenu: One of the oldest mail order companies in the US. I remember their catalogs from the past. Pricing could be a little more competitive. But a company with longevity as long as they have been around shows they must be doing something right.

Review.Titre: Decent speakers; installation was a nightmare
Review.Contenu: The speakers sound good.  I deducted 2 stars because of the installation. The master sheet did not mention anything about the extensive modification needed to the mounting brackets for the rear door speakers. First, the mounting holes for the speakers needed to be drilled out so the supplied hardware would fit. Second, the 2019 Outback requires the removal of all of the detachable tabs on the inside and outside. Crutchfield, please update your master sheet for the 2019 Outback so other users do not spend 3 hours on a project that shouldn’t take more than 45 minutes.

Review.Titre: The front end of sales was great but....
Review.Contenu: The front end of sales was great. The guy who helped me did a great job suggesting my upgrade. However I was told that shipping would be in 1 to 2 days. I got my receiver five days after ordering. Granted two of those were weekends but it was scheduled to arrive on Friday. But it got pushed to Monday. I called to ask why and a very rude gentleman called me back and said it was my fault and that the dates are just estimated. And that if I wanted it before the weekend I should have ordered it on Monday. He was very rude. So they lose half their rating just because of that jerk.

Review.Titre: I'm really happy with the selection of…
Review.Contenu: I'm really happy with the selection of products and price point. That being said I don't do reviews or surveys because the truth hurts. I've been bombarded with emails from Crutcfield since my purchase and that is annoying to say the least. Please STOP!!
Easy order, quick shipping.  Woukd be 5 stars, but 4x6 dash speakers that Crutchfield said didn't work in my truck, fit with no modifications at all.

Review.Titre: For the most part it was an easy…
Review.Contenu: For the most part it was an easy removal of old radio and easy install of new. Wiring is always a pain. Some connections need better explanation. Had a few extra plug-ins from old radio that were not mentioned.

SetUp info for Sonos One SL says to install the Sonos app.  Google Play Store showed me a "Sono S1, S2 Speaker Controller" app from Vulcan Labs, which commenters claim is designed to mislead Sonos users. I nearly installed it - I wish Crutchfield or Sonos had warned me about it.

Support was great.  I did not have to wait long to get to a person.  He was able to receive a photo of my issue although he had not seen my wiring harness situation he gave me a a hint on how to determine a way to address if the connections were correct.

Review.Titre: Easy to navigate web site and all parts…
Review.Contenu: Easy to navigate web site and all parts to install my new radio were included and had very easy to follow instructions.

While I probably paid a little more for a Denon AVR I purchased recently, my experience with Crutchfield tech support was priceless. The tech spent nearly 2 hours with me walking me through the setup process. Not only did he help me with questions about my new Denon, he helped answer questions about other components connected to it.

Selection and purchase process was excellent. The installation instructions were somewhat lacking. The replacement speakers required an adapter which I ordered along with the speakers and wiring harness. There were no instructions with the adapter so it was a trial and error effort until I was able to get them fit and secured.

4.5 out of 5 stars.  The application is for a single DIN Sony radio to replace a poorly mounted double DIN unit in a 4th Generation (1990) Honda Accord.  Fast shipment with everything nicely packed as promised.  The radio is great.The instructions for the mounting kit itself are for a variety of 1990-2002 Acura & Honda models, specifically noting the "INST-7800 is a collection of installation instruction booklets".  In the kit itself, the so-called "support bracket" is a joke, though that’s not so clear from the order page.  However, the separately enclosed Crutchfield authored vehicle-specific Master installation booklet picture an image for a superior metal bracket.  I rarely call support, but this time, I did.A live person was online quickly and able to pull up the order from my phone number.  When I noted the inconsistency, the patient, knowledgeable and articulate support professional admitted the metal bracket was no longer part of the kit for this application.  I was disappointed that the mounting kit did not include a provision for the lower storage tray.  It's set up to enable a cool amplifier, but the online description of the kit for my application did not mention this omission/assumption.Thanks to more online research I discovered the support bracket in my case is superfluous, and found a Metra 99-7892 SKU that works as well as the plastic from Crutchfield along with a useful lower tray that is close enough to the stock unit.If the car wasn't so old, I'd grade more harshly, but am trying to offer specific and overall positive feedback.  Crutchfield is a solid place for a variety of quality automotive electronics and support, but at least for an older vehicle, I'll invest in buying the installation bits that are typically included with the electronics before spending the larger sum.
